Title: Drupal core Multiple vulnerabilities due to the use of the third-party library Archive_Tar
Description:
The Drupal project uses the third-party library [Archive_Tar](https://pear.php.net/package/Archive_Tar/), which has released a security improvement that is needed to protect some Drupal configurations.

Multiple vulnerabilities are possible if Drupal is configured to allow .tar, .tar.gz, .bz2 or .tlz file uploads and processes them.

The latest versions of Drupal update Archive_Tar to 1.4.9 to mitigate the file processing vulnerabilities.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 7.0.0 before 7.69, all versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.7.11, all versions starting from 8.8.0 before 8.8.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 7.0.0, all versions starting from 7.69 before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.7.11 before 8.8.0, all versions starting from 8.8.1
